title: Updated: SQ, BEI will investigate after bodies found in an SUV in St-Léonard
author: Montreal Gazette
blurb: Giuseppe Arcuri, 59, and his mother, Lucia Giovanna Arcuri, 76, had been reported missing on Wednesday. Police are treating their deaths as suspicious.

title: Allison Hanes: We should all be outraged by the latest idea for solving Quebec's family-doctor crisis
author: Allison Hanes
blurb: Taking away people's GPs and reassigning them to the most vulnerable patients would only worsen the health of all Quebecers.

title: 'Quebecers who have a family doctor will keep one,' Dubé vows after blowback
author: Harry North
blurb: The Quebec health minister's comments come after a report recommended giving vulnerable patients priority access to family doctors.

title: No changes to Canadiens' lineup against Kings Thursday night
author: Stu Cowan
blurb: That means Samuel Montembeault will start his third straight game in goal for Habs, while Jayden Struble and Michael Pezzetta will sit out.

title: 5,000 SAQ workers walk off the job Thursday
author: Lia Lévesque
blurb: It's the third of 15 strike days as several contract issues are still under negotiation.

title: Montreal anglo leaders rally behind Anthony Housefather, stay silent on Liberals
author: Harry North
blurb: More than 60 urge voters in the Mount Royal riding to re-elect him, praising his advocacy for the English-speaking community and his efforts to tackle antisemitism.
